items.name: Taste of Hate
explicitMods: 12% of Physical Damage from Hits taken as Cold Damage during Effect
Gain 15% of Physical Damage as Extra Cold Damage during effect
30% chance to Avoid being Chilled during Effect
30% chance to Avoid being Frozen during Effect
items.descrText: Right click to drink. Can only hold charges while in belt. Refills as you kill monsters.
flavourText: A sip will freeze your lips,
A swig will chill your heart,
A glass will still your soul.

items.name: Chitus' Apex
explicitMods: +20 to Strength
+21 to maximum Mana
5% increased Experience gain
+10% to all Elemental Resistances
19% increased Elemental Damage
flavourText: "It takes true strength to hold power,
and my grip grows tighter by the day."
- Emperor Chitus

socketedItems.secDescrText: Supports any skill with an area of effect, regardless of whether that skill deals damage.
explicitMods: Supported Skills deal 25% more Area Damage
Supported Skills have 30% less Area of Effect
socketedItems.descrText: This is a Support Gem. It does not grant a bonus to your character, but to skills in sockets connected to it. Place into an item socket connected to a socket containing the Skill Gem you wish to augment. Right click to remove from a socket.

Enemies Chilled by Supported Skills increase Cold Damage taken by Chill Effect

items.typeLine: Terrified Divine Life Flask of Assuaging
explicitMods: 17% reduced Amount Recovered
Instant Recovery when on Low Life

Grants Immunity to Bleeding for 15 seconds if used while Bleeding
Grants Immunity to Corrupted Blood for 15 seconds if used while affected by Corrupted Blood
items.descrText: Right click to drink. Can only hold charges while in belt. Refills as you kill monsters.

items.name: Dialla's Malefaction
explicitMods: Gems can be Socketed in this Item ignoring Socket Colour
Gems Socketed in Red Sockets have +2 to Level
Gems Socketed in Green Sockets have +30% to Quality
Gems Socketed in Blue Sockets gain 100% increased Experience
Has no Attribute Requirements
flavourText: He took me by my hand, promised me power beyond compare.
But I did not do it for power.
I did it for love.
And I'd do it again in an instant.
